title: Dexter: Early Cuts
resume: Dexter Early Cuts is a web-based series in the form of an animated comic about the character Dexter Morgan and his earliest kills, thus the name "Early Cuts". The series is narrated by Michael C. Hall from the Showtime series and chronicles characters from that series (not the novels).

The series is narrated by Michael C. Hall from the Showtime series and chronicles characters from that series (not the novels).
